ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_1: Faucet is a special kind of logistics item
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_2: It can transfer fluid from the block it is attached to to the block below it
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_3: It can transfer the fluid in the container
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_4: The water within the water-containing block
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_5: Even the fluid in the world!
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_6: You can R-Click it to turn the output on or off
ue_addons.ponder.faucet.text_7: You can also use it to transport items in containers! However, the transportation efficiency of this method is not very high, but it is very useful in some special occasions!
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_1: To use Melter, you need to place an Heater first
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_2: Then place an Heater above the Melter
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_3: Then place Ceared Table and Seared Basin on any two sides of Heater
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_4: Then place Faucet on any two sides of Melter
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_5: Then you need to add fuels to Heater
ue_addons.ponder.melter.text_6: After adding fuels, you can add items to be smelted in Melter
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
Rectangular Scorched Bricks composition
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Foundry Controller
Fuel Tank
Scorched Drain
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
ue_addons.ponder.scorched.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
Rectangular Seared Bricks composition
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Fuel Tank
Smeltery Controller
Seared Drain
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
ue_addons.ponder.smeltery.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
ue_addons.ponder.the_accelerator_of_mech: Rightclick it with an iron mechanism in hand...
...and the stone around it changes into ore!
The accelerator also supports other mechanisms
But attention, only blocks in 5x5 zone around it can be transformed!
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_1: This is an ordinary thermal machine
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_10: Click here to view all recipes
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_2: When we R-Click it, an interface ui up
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_3: Here is an energy tank for storing redstone flux RF (electrical energy)
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_4: Put the battery in here can also supply power
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui.text_9: When the progress bar is completed, the input items will be consumed and then output
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_1: This is a thermal machine with a trough of items only.
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_10: It is worth mentioning that this setting is applicable in most Mods
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_12: The machine will automatically extract items
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_2: Click here to open the configuration page
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_3: Power the machine from any side
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_4: Turn on automatic input and output here.
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_5: and set the input and output of each face
ue_addons.ponder.thermal_gui2.text_8: The hybrid represents both input and output
ue_addons.ponder.water_pump.text_1: If you want to use the water pump
ue_addons.ponder.water_pump.text_2: You need to build a complete structure first
ue_addons.ponder.water_pump.text_4: Finally, put on the machine body
ue_addons.ponder.water_pump.text_5: After the structure is built, the pipeline can be used to pump water
ae2.ponder.cable.text_1: Except the thick and thin cables
ae2.ponder.cable.text_2: There are 3 more types of cable bus in AE2
ae2.ponder.cable.text_3: Quartz fiber can transmit energy between ME networks without impacting channels
ae2.ponder.cable.text_4: Toggle Bus and Inverted Toggle Bus can switch connection of devices to ME system
ae2.ponder.cable.text_5: Now the device above is online while the device below is offline
ae2.ponder.cable.text_6: If a redstone signal comes here...
ae2.ponder.cable.text_7: Now the device below is online while the device above is offline
ae2.ponder.channel.text_1: Channels are essential to ME Networks
ae2.ponder.channel.text_3: While thin cables transmit only 8 channels
ae2.ponder.channel.text_5: No more channels can go through this cable
ae2.ponder.channel.text_6: This may cause some devices go offline
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_1: Condenser is a device to consume extra stuffs/fluids and create new items
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_2: In most cases, it is suggested to pump water into the condenser
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_3: As it is mostly used to create matter balls and singularities
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_4: A condenser needs a cell component to function
ae2.ponder.condenser.text_5: Switch the condenser to related mode to create matter balls and singularities
ae2.ponder.controller.text_2: It provides energy source and info transmission of the ME system
ae2.ponder.controller.text_3: By storing AE energy and providing channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_4: The controller should be powered to work
ae2.ponder.controller.text_5: Every side of a single ME controller block provides at most 32 channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_6: ME controllers could be connected to provide more channels
ae2.ponder.controller.text_7: AE devices can be placed besides the controller or connected with cables
ae2.ponder.controller.text_9: While thin cables transmit only 8 channels
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_1: As just presented, Me networks need a Crafting CPU to automize recipes
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_2: Crafting CPU consists of 8 types of blocks divided into 4 groups
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_3: Crafting Unit is the basic material of Crafting CPUs, while they're also user to fill extra space of CPUs
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_4: 5 types of Crafting Storage provides computing ability and stores incomplete results
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_5: But Crafting CPUs with only Crafting Storage is a single-thread core
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_6: While every Crafting Accelerator provides one more thread to the CPU
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_7: Crafting Monitor has a screen on it, showing what recipe the CPU is processing
ae2.ponder.crafting_cpu_structure.text_8: These blocks must be placed as a rectangle to form and work
ae2.ponder.drive.text_2: It provides storage space for the ME system
ae2.ponder.drive.text_3: Place Storage Cells into the drive to provide storage space
ae2.ponder.drive.text_4: ME Drives should be connected to ME network to function
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_1: Me P2P Tunnels are devices to transmit channels via another ME network
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_2: P2P stands for Point to Point, edges of P2P Tunnels shows no difference from direct connection
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_3: P2P Tunnels need to set connections with a Memory Card
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_4: And now channels can go through P2P Tunnels!
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_5: P2P tunnel provides only one-way transmission, but it supports multiple outputs
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_6: But attention! Every one of P2P Tunnel will consume 1 channel!
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_7: Rightclick the tunnel with a Redstone or a Redstone Block to transform it into a Redstone P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.p2p_tunnel.text_8: Rightclick the tunnel with a Chest or a Hopper to transform it into an Item P2P Tunnel
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_1: Throw the singularity onto the ground with an ender pearl or an ender dust
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_2: Blow them up with a TNT or a tiny tnt
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_3: And here is a pair of Quantum Entangled Singularity(QES)!
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_4: Pairs of QESs can be put into pairs of Quantum Rings
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_5: Only the Quantum Rings right beside the Quantum Link can transmit channels
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_6: And now this ME Drive is connected
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_7: To the ME Network of this ME Controller
ae2.ponder.quantum_ring.text_8: Quantum Ring support inter-dimentional channel transmission, which means it can be used for the transportation between dimentions
ae2.ponder.simple_crafting_automation.te: While this is a Pattern Provider
Connect them into a ME network with a Molecular Assembler
And this is a most simple Crafting Automation Network
Create a Pattern with a Pattern Encoding Terminal, for example, 2 Andesite Alloy => 8 Shaft
And plug it into the Pattern Provider
And the terminal will show support of Shaft crafting, order them whenever they are needed
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_1: Spatial Pylons and Spatial IO Port are devices on spatial storage and transportation
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_2: Spatial Pylons must be placed in rows and columns, connect each row or column with Cables
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_3: Build a rectangle with Spatial Pylons to select a zone in world
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_4: And connect a Spatial IO Port to the ME network
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_5: Ensure all Spatial Pylons are inside the green rectangle while outside the purple
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_6: Name of the Spatial Storage Cell marks its maximum storage space
ae2.ponder.spatial_storage.text_7: Put a Spatial Storage Cell into the Spatial IO Port
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_1: This is a Wireless Access Point
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_2: It allows users to get access to the ME network remotely
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_3: Well, with an ME Wireless Terminal in hand
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_4: By default, the Wireless Access Point provides access from 16 blocks away
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_5: Plug in Wireless Boosters to increase access distance
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_6: By maximum it provides 528 blocks of distant access with a set of Wireless Booster
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_7: If a Quantum Ring has already been built
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_8: Plug a Quantum Bridge Card and a Quantum Entangled Singularity into a Wireless Universal Terminal
ae2.ponder.wireless_connection.text_9: To gain access of infinity distance and inter-dimentions
